titles.title: A bill to authorize the President to issue posthumously to the late William "Billy" Mitchell a commission as major general, United States Army.
A bill to authorize the President to issue posthumously to the late William "Billy" Mitchell a commission as major general, United States Army.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Authorizes the President to issue, posthumously, a commission as major general, United States Army, in the name of William "Billy" Mitchell, a former colonel who resigned his commission on February 1, 1926.
